The question this research is aiming to give an answer to is:
"Can a death event be predicted when blood ejection fraction and platelet data is given using machine learning techniques?"

```{r}

data <- read.csv(file = "heart_failure_clinical_records_dataset.csv")
data$age <- as.integer(data$age)


```
```{r}
dead <- data$DEATH_EVENT == 1
myColors <- c("#746AB0", "#E83845")

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = data, aes(x = serum_creatinine, y = creatinine_phosphokinase, colour = factor(dead))) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) + scale_color_manual(values=myColors)
```
